About 59 Kelly Rd Unit 59

Newly Renovated Exquisite Townhouse in Cambridgeport. Contemporary & elegant open-plan 2 bedroom, 3.5 bath, with parking, designed by Architect Boyes-Watson. The stunning main level has soaring ceilings in the open plan kitchen, dining, and living room; stainless high-end appliances and a breakfast bar island with pendant lamps adorn the space. Statuesque walls of windows flood the home with natural light - perfectly suited for entertaining. A half bath round out this level, ensuring functionality at your fingertips. The second floor features dual master suites, each with its own modern bath and double walk-in closets; one with balcony. This three-level home features hardwood floors, marble baths, central air, in unit laundry, lit stairways, and finished basement with bath and ample storage. High end appointments and modern amenities throughout make for a truly luxurious home. Nearby to Harvard, MIT, BU, Central Square, Red Line, Charles River, Whole Foods, and Trader Joes.
